system.description:
Summons blazing meteors from the sky to rain down on enemies, creating four 40-foot radius explosions anywhere within range, dealing fire and bludgeoning damage.

Scaling: At dice count 6, summons eight meteors. At dice count 9, meteors leave craters and burning terrain. At dice count 12, calls down a continuous meteor shower. At dice count 15, summons apocalyptic meteor storm covering a 500-foot radius.
